Description

Installation

Prerequisites

  • Python 3.10 or higher
  • pip or uv package manager

Install via pip

pip install htmlgraph

Install via uv

uv pip install htmlgraph

Verify Installation

python -c "import htmlgraph; print(htmlgraph.__version__)"

Next Steps

Ready to start? Check out the Quickstart Guide.
